subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets running back Leon Washington returned to the team Monday after boycotting practice the last three weeks while in a contract dispute. Washington, selected for his first Pro Bowl last season as a kick returner, was back on the field to start the Jets’ final week of team activities. His agent, Alvin Keels, wrote on his Twitter page that Washington returned “while we continue to work on a contract extension for him.”.
